attributes.title: Are Mandalas Black Magic?
attributes.description:
18 DECEMBER 2019 - POWERFUL COGNITIONS FROM TODAY’S NITHYANANDA (ENGLISH) SATSANG

*TODAY’S MESSAGE FROM KAILAASA: DELUDED PEOPLE ALWAYS BELIEVE OTHERS ARE DELUDED. AND THE MOST FUNNY THING IS THAT THIS IS THE SAME ARGUMENT ABUSERS USE AGAINST ME AND THE SANGA! 

*HOW TO FIND OUT IF SOMEBODY IS DELUDED OR NOT? WHOEVER IS CONSTANTLY INSPIRING, WORKING, CONTRIBUTING TO OTHERS LIFE, RAISING EVERYONE’S QUALITY OF CONSCIOUSNESS DAY IN AND OUT, WHO IS DOING THE JOB OF LIBERATING AND ENLIGHTENING PEOPLE - HE IS THE ONE WHO IS NOT DELUDED! 

*A DEVOTEE HAS POSTED AN ABUSER’S COMMENT BRINGING IT TO NOTICE REGARDING THE ONGOING PERSECUTION: IF THERE IS NO FIRE THERE WILL BE NO SMOKE. UNDERSTAND: THERE IS NEITHER FIRE NOR SMOKE HERE. IT IS SMOG! THE ATTACK GOING ON NOW HAS MORE LIES THAN 2010 ATTACK OR THE EARLIER ATTACKS. THE IDEA OF FIRE IS GENERATED THROUGH SMOG. THIS TIME’S ATTACK HAS NO SUBSTANCE. JUST WAIT FOR ONE OR TWO DAYS, IT WILL SETTLE DOWN. 

*SOMETIMES I AM NOT DIRECTLY ATTENDING TO PEOPLE AND THEIR DOUBTS AND QUESTIONS, BECAUSE THEY ARE WAITING TO GET HURT. IF YOU LOOK AT SOMEONE WITH A LOT OF RESPECT, REVERENCE, AND WHEN SOMEONE COMES AND PUTS HEAVY LIES CONTINUOUSLY ON THAT PERSON AND SHAKES EVEN THE WAY YOU PERCEIVE YOU AND DISTURBS YOU, THEN YOU START LOOKING AT THE SAME PERSON WITH LESS REVERENCE. 

*IT IS TOO EASY TO TRIGGER SOMEBODY’S DOUBT AND MAKE THEM THINK, “WHO KNOWS MAYBE - YES..YES...” WHEN SOMEONE’S HATRED, DENIAL AND ANGER IS TRIGGERED, SUDDENLY THEY FEEL THEY HAVE BEEN CHEATED. WHEN TOO MANY OF SUCH EMOTIONS COME UP, THEY THEMSELVES ARE NOT ABLE TO HANDLE THEMSELVES. THEY ARE WAITING TO GET HURT, AND ANY WORDS I USE, THEY WILL USE IT TO HURT THEMSELVES MORE. 

*WHEN PEOPLE ARE WAITING TO GET HURT, THEY WILL MAKE THEIR OWN MEANING OF WHAT I SAY. WHEN GURU DENIAL, HATRED, DOUBT IS GENERATED, IT TURNS TO SELF DOUBT, SELF HATRED, SELF DENIAL. 

*PEOPLE DON’T UNDERSTAND THE DIFFERENCE BETWEEN A DOCTOR AND A BUTCHER. I AM A DOCTOR, NOT A BUTCHER! 

*WHEN PEOPLE ARE ANGRY, FRUSTRATED, HAVING MOOD SWINGS, THE BEST THING TO DO IS TO HAVE LITTLE PATIENCE, WAIT FOR THEM TO SETTLE DOWN, AND WHEN THE TIME IS READY, START EXPLAINING TO THEM. 

*I CAN SEE IN THE LAST 15 DAYS, PEOPLE HAVE SLOWLY SETTLED DOWN AND STARTED LISTENING. NOW, I AM SENDING CLEAR POWERFUL COGNITIONS AND RIGHT UNDERSTANDINGS TO THEM. 

*I AM DEALING WITH MILLIONS OF PEOPLE AND RAISING THEM. IT IS NOT A JOKE TO BE NITHYANANDA. ANYONE WHO IS READY TO TAKE RESPONSIBILITY, I AM MORE THAN HAPPY TO GIVE IT TO THEM! JUST BECAUSE OF PARAMASHIVA’S GRACE AND MAHAKALABHAIRAVA’S PROTECTION, I AM STILL ALIVE, SANGA IS STILL ALIVE, FLOURISHING AND SPREADING. IT IS TOO MUCH OF WORK AND RESPONSIBILITY. 

*IT IS ABOUT UNDERSTANDING EVERY PERSON. I HAVE SEEN PEOPLE, EXTREME DEVOTEES WHO ARE READY TO GIVE UP THEIR LIFE FOR MY CUP OF COFFEE IN THE MORNING. AND I HAVE SEEN TRAITORS WHO ARE READY TO SELL ME FOR THEIR CUP OF COFFEE! 

*HOW DO THESE DELUDED TRAITORS BEHAVE? WHEN I GIVE A VISION, THEY DELUDEDLY ASSUME THAT IT IS A PROMISE TO THEM. NOT ONLY THEY WILL NOT TAKE RESPONSIBILITY FOR THE VISION, THEY WILL THINK THAT THEY WILL BE PUT IN THE PALANQUIN AND I SHOULD CARRY THEM! YES, I AM READY TO THAT, BUT THEY DESTROY THE PALANQUIN AND THE KINGDOM! THEY JUST USE ME, AND BULLY AND DESTROY EVERYONE. 

*I ALSO HAVE LITTLE PATIENCE WAITING FOR THEM TO EVOLVE. BUT MY PATIENCE IS MISTAKEN AS “I NEED THEM”. THEN THEY STRATEGICALLY PRAISE ME. I AM AFRAID ONLY OF ONE THING: POISONOUS PEOPLE STRATEGICALLY PRAISING ME! THEY BUILD THEIR DELUSION THAT THEY ARE TOO IMPORTANT AND FORM THEIR OWN GANG. THEY EXPLOIT THE INNOCENCE OF PEOPLE, USING FEAR AND GREED TO CONTROL PEOPLE. AND SO CUNNINGLY THEY WILL USE MY NAME.

*EVEN NOW, I HAVE NOT AUTHORISED ANYONE TO SPEAK ON MY BEHALF IN MEDIA BECAUSE PEOPLE WHO WANT TO HURT THE SANGA FIRST WANT TO BECOME MY SPOKESPERSON. ONCE THEY GET A LITTLE AUTHORITY, THEY CAN RUN RIOT AND RUIN. 

*DELUDED PEOPLE ARE IN TOO MUCH OF DELUSION, AND THEY STRONGLY BELIEVE THAT THEY HAVE DELUDED ME BY SAYING THAT I DO NOT KNOW AND I AM UNAWARE. AND I ALSO BEHAVE TO MAKE THEM THINK: WHEN YOU FEEL I SHOULD NOT KNOW SOMETHING, I ALSO WILL BEHAVE THAT WAY!
